title: Articles of impeachment: Beth Fouhy, John Podhoretz and Christine Pelosi
description: House Democrats have announced their charges against President Trump, the inspector general report is out and Elizabeth Warren's front-runner status is questionable. Plus, Speaker Pelosi's daughter Christine Pelosi joins Chuck Todd to discuss her book on the leader.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
